wikipedia_page.main: Andreas Andrea James Arestidou (born 6 December 1989) is an English professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper who plays for Fleetwood Town. He attended Lancaster Royal Grammar School and was a member of the school cricket team, he was well known for his hostile yet accurate bowling style.
